entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
